title: How to Check the Version of Your Mac

steps.headline: Click the little blue or gray apple at the top.
Click on the 'About This Mac' option.
Under the Apple and Mac OS X, you should see in small print "Version 10,--,--".I am running 10.6.6
See if you can run software.
steps.description: Google Chrome requires 10.5 or later, for example

tyn: All the normal computer stuff, like a mouse, keyboard.
text: Click the little blue or gray apple at the top.  Click on the 'About This Mac' option.  Under the Apple and Mac OS X, you should see in small print "Version 10,--,--".I am running 10.6.6  See if you can run software. Google Chrome requires 10.5 or later, for example
